Description:
Detects file deletion using "rm", "shred" or "unlink" commands which are used often by adversaries to delete files left behind by the actions of their intrusion activity

Author: Ömer Günal, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: File Deletion
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path like '%/rm' or process_path like '%/shred' or process_path like '%/unlink')
